name: Pico Gem Flip
description:
Inspired by the Puyo Puyo games, Pico Gem Flip is a puzzle game where you must drop pairs of gems onto the board and match together 4+ gems of the same color in a sequence of chains/combos to complete the missions. A special arrow tile, if destroyed next to a group of 4+ gems, will flip the board, allowing for more complex combos.

Made for the Fantasy Console Game Jam.

Controls:

  • Left, Right, Down arrow keys - move gem pair
  • Z or C or N - rotate gem pair counterclockwise, menu select
  • X or V or M - rotate gem pair clockwise
